amanda berry key knitting pattern k knit chilli pepper kfb knit into the front and back increase make 1 k2tog knit two stitches together decrease cast on 4 sts in red yarn on straight 2 75mm needles p purl start at the bottom rs right side row 1 rs knit st s stitch es row 2 ws purl ws wrong side row 3 k1 kfb 2 times k1 6 sts row 4 purl notes row 5 k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 8 sts row 6 to 8 starting on a ws purl row work 3 casting on row in stockinette use the cable cast on and leave a 30cm yarn tail row 9 k1 kfb knit the remaining sts 9 sts for seaming row 10 to 25 repeat row 6 to 9 four more pull through to cast off times 13 sts break the yarn leaving a 30cm tail thread the row 26 to 30 starting on a ws purl row work tail onto a tapestry needle and thread through 5 row in stockinette the stitches on the knitting needle pulling them off the needle and onto the yarn and pull tight row 31 k1 kfb knit the remaining sts 14 sts to gather together break the red working yarn and join green seaming row 32 purl use your cast on/off tails for seaming in mattress row 33 k2tog 7 times 7 sts stitch a one stitch seam allowance has been pull through to cast off included in the pattern stockinette making up also known as stocking stitch knit rs row and purl ws row sew the side edges together adding stuffing as you sew but leave the bottom end free from stuffing gather the cast on sts together at the bottom to finish embroider the leaves with green yarn in 6 small vertical stitches over the last red row around the top of the chilli for the stalk cast on 9 sts in green yarn
